title: Restart necessary in order to DL & install each new app.
content:
Hi all, anyone else having this same problem?

For the last few months, anytime I hit the "install" button on an app in the Play Store, as usual, the download indicator pops up, but the app never downloads/installs.

In order to get the app to DL/install, I have to restart the phone at least once.  One time it took at least 2 times...maybe 3 (memory is not serving right now :-D).

The phone is a Pixel XL, if I am not mistaken.

Come one Google, fix this please.

Thanks for any help anyone can provide,

CTB
